item_description: Minor procedure on a patient by a medical practitioner (except a specialist in the practice of the specialistâ€™s specialty of emergency medicine) at a recognised emergency department of a private hospital, in conjunction with an attendance on the patient by the practitioner described in item 5021, 5022, 5027, 5030, 5031, 5032, 5033, 5035 or 5036 (Anaes.)
rationale: The note describes a concussion following a bicycle accident with reassurance and education, no procedure performed, and no evidence of a minor procedure. The item requires a minor procedure, which is not documented.
citations: Patient 11 years old with history of bicycle accident involving head and leg impact, with brief loss of consciousness.
Management: Reassurance, education on short-term and long-term effects of concussion; advice to return to ED if concerns arise in next 24-48 hours.
